Chap. 5 - Laboring in Unity and in Faith


                   Sanitarium, Cal., Oct. 15, 1906. 
Dear Brethren,-- 
     Among brethren engaged in various lines of the Lord's work there should ever be seen a desire to encourage and strengthen one another. The Lord is not pleased with the course of those who make the way difficult for some who are doing a work appointed to them by the Master. If these critics were placed in the position of those whom they criticize, they would desire far different treatment from that which they give their brethren.
